verses.verse: Now therefore <S%H8085>hearken<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and unto the <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, which I <S%H3925>teach<s%> you, for to <S%H6213>do<s%> them, that ye may <S%H2421>live<s%>, and go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> you.

Ye shall not <S%H3254>add<s%> unto the <S%H1697>word<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, neither shall ye <S%H1639>diminish<s%> ought from it, that ye may <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you.

Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> what the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> because of <S%H1187>Baalpeor<s%>: for all the <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H1980><s%> <S%H1187>Baalpeor<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.
But ye that did <S%H1695>cleave<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> are <S%H2416>alive<s%> every one of you this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

<S%H7200>Behold<s%>, I have <S%H3925>taught<s%> you <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, even <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me, that ye should <S%H6213>do<s%> so <S%H7130>in<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> whither ye <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

<S%H8104>Keep<s%> therefore and <S%H6213>do<s%> them; for this is your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and your <S%H998>understanding<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>nations<s%>, which shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> all these <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, Surely this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> is a <S%H2450>wise<s%> and <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>.

For what <S%H1471>nation<s%> is there so <S%H1419>great<s%>, who hath <S%H430>God<s%> so <S%H7138>nigh<s%> unto them, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is in all things that we <S%H7121>call<s%> upon him for?

And what <S%H1471>nation<s%> is there so <S%H1419>great<s%>, that hath <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> so <S%H6662>righteous<s%> as all this <S%H8451>law<s%>, which I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>?

Only take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to thyself, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3966>diligently<s%>, lest thou <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H1697>things<s%> which thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%>, and lest they <S%H5493>depart<s%> from thy <S%H3824>heart<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life<s%>: but <S%H3045>teach<s%> them thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and thy <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>;

Specially the <S%H3117>day<s%> that thou <S%H5975>stoodest<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>, when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H6950>Gather<s%> me the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6950>together<s%>, and I will make them <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%>, that they may <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> me all the <S%H3117>days<s%> that they shall <S%H2416>live<s%> upon the <S%H127>earth<s%>, and that they may <S%H3925>teach<s%> their <S%H1121>children<s%>.

And ye came <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> under the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>; and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H1197>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, with <S%H6205>darkness<s%>, <S%H6051>clouds<s%>, and thick <S%H2822>darkness<s%>. midst: Heb. heart

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto you out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%>: ye <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%>, but <S%H7200>saw<s%> no <S%H8544>similitude<s%>; <S%H2108>only<s%> ye heard a <S%H6963>voice<s%>. only: Heb. save a voice

And he <S%H5046>declared<s%> unto you his <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you to <S%H6213>perform<s%>, even <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1697>commandments<s%>; and he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> them upon <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me at that <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H3925>teach<s%> you <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, that ye might <S%H6213>do<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> whither ye go <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

Take ye therefore <S%H3966>good<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> unto <S%H5315>yourselves<s%>; for ye <S%H7200>saw<s%> no manner of <S%H8544>similitude<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto you in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%>:

Lest ye <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> yourselves, and <S%H6213>make<s%> you a graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, the <S%H8544>similitude<s%> of any <S%H5566>figure<s%>, the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H2145>male<s%> or <S%H5347>female<s%>,

The <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of any <S%H929>beast<s%> that is on the <S%H776>earth<s%>, the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of any <S%H3671>winged<s%> <S%H6833>fowl<s%> that <S%H5774>flieth<s%> in the <S%H8064>air<s%>,

The <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of any thing that <S%H7430>creepeth<s%> on the <S%H127>ground<s%>, the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of any <S%H1710>fish<s%> that is in the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H8478>beneath<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>:

And lest thou lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> unto <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and when thou <S%H7200>seest<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, and the <S%H3394>moon<s%>, and the <S%H3556>stars<s%>, even all the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, shouldest be <S%H5080>driven<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> them, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H2505>divided<s%> unto all <S%H5971>nations<s%> under the whole <S%H8064>heaven<s%>. divided: or, imparted

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3947>taken<s%> you, and brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H3564>furnace<s%>, even out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to be unto him a <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, as ye are this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Furthermore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with me for your <S%H1697>sakes<s%>, and <S%H7650>sware<s%> that I should not go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and that I should not <S%H935>go<s%> in unto that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>:

But I must <S%H4191>die<s%> in this <S%H776>land<s%>, I must not go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>: but ye shall go <S%H5674>over<s%>, and <S%H3423>possess<s%> that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>.

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> unto yourselves, lest ye <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with you, and <S%H6213>make<s%> you a graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, or the <S%H8544>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> thing, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6680>forbidden<s%> thee.
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H398>consuming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>, even a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>.

When thou shalt <S%H3205>beget<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%>, and <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%>, and ye shall have remained <S%H3462>long<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, and shall <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> yourselves, and <S%H6213>make<s%> a graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, or the <S%H8544>likeness<s%> of any thing, and shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger<s%>:

I <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H5749>witness<s%> against you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that ye shall <S%H4118>soon<s%> <S%H6>utterly<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> from off the <S%H776>land<s%> whereunto ye go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; ye shall not <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> upon it, but shall <S%H8045>utterly<s%> be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6327>scatter<s%> you among the <S%H5971>nations<s%>, and ye shall be <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H4962>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, whither the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5090>lead<s%> you.

And there ye shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H120>men's<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%>, <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone<s%>, which neither <S%H7200>see<s%>, nor <S%H8085>hear<s%>, nor <S%H398>eat<s%>, nor <S%H7306>smell<s%>.

But if from thence thou shalt <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, thou shalt <S%H4672>find<s%> him, if thou <S%H1875>seek<s%> him with all thy <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with all thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

When thou art in <S%H6862>tribulation<s%>, and all these <S%H1697>things<s%> are <S%H4672>come<s%> upon thee, even in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, if thou <S%H7725>turn<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and shalt be <S%H8085>obedient<s%> unto his <S%H6963>voice<s%>; are: Heb. have found thee

(For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H7349>merciful<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>;) he will not <S%H7503>forsake<s%> thee, neither <S%H7843>destroy<s%> thee, nor <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto them.

For <S%H7592>ask<s%> now of the <S%H3117>days<s%> that are <S%H7223>past<s%>, which <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and ask from the one <S%H7097>side<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> unto the other, whether there hath been any such thing as this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> is, or hath been <S%H8085>heard<s%> like it?

Did ever <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> speaking <S%H1696>out<s%> of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%>, as thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%>, and <S%H2421>live<s%>?

Or hath <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5254>assayed<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> him a <S%H1471>nation<s%> from the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of another <S%H1471>nation<s%>, by <S%H4531>temptations<s%>, by <S%H226>signs<s%>, and by <S%H4159>wonders<s%>, and by <S%H4421>war<s%>, and by a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and by a stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>, and by <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4172>terrors<s%>, according to all that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> for you in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>?
Unto thee it was <S%H7200>shewed<s%>, that thou mightest <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> he is <S%H430>God<s%>; there is none <S%H5750>else<s%> beside <S%H905>him<s%>.

Out of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> he made thee to <S%H8085>hear<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, that he might <S%H3256>instruct<s%> thee: and upon <S%H776>earth<s%> he <S%H7200>shewed<s%> thee his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>; and thou <S%H8085>heardest<s%> his <S%H1697>words<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And because he <S%H157>loved<s%> thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, therefore he <S%H977>chose<s%> their <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, and brought thee <S%H3318>out<s%> in his <S%H6440>sight<s%> with his <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>;

To drive <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> thee <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> than thou art, to <S%H935>bring<s%> thee in, to <S%H5414>give<s%> thee their <S%H776>land<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

<S%H3045>Know<s%> therefore this <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H7725>consider<s%> it in thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> he is <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%>, and upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> beneath: there is none else.

Thou shalt <S%H8104>keep<s%> therefore his <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that it may go <S%H3190>well<s%> with thee, and with thy <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee, and that thou mayest <S%H748>prolong<s%> thy <S%H3117>days<s%> upon the <S%H127>earth<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee, for ever.
Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H914>severed<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H8121>sunrising<s%> <S%H4217><s%>;

That the <S%H7523>slayer<s%> might <S%H5127>flee<s%> thither, which should <S%H7523>kill<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%> <S%H1097>unawares<s%> <S%H1847><s%>, and <S%H8130>hated<s%> him not in <S%H8543>times<s%> <S%H8032>past<s%>; and that <S%H5127>fleeing<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> he might <S%H2425>live<s%>:

Namely, <S%H1221>Bezer<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, in the <S%H4334>plain<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>, of the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>; and <S%H7216>Ramoth<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, of the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>; and <S%H1474>Golan<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, of the <S%H4520>Manassites<s%>.
And this is the <S%H8451>law<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

These are the <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>, and the <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, after they came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>,

On this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H1047>Bethpeor<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, whom <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%>, after they were come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>:

And they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> his <S%H776>land<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, which were on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrising<s%> <S%H8121><s%>;
From <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, which is by the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, even unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H7865>Sion<s%>, which is <S%H2768>Hermon<s%>,

And all the <S%H6160>plain<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%>, even unto the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>plain<s%>, under the <S%H794>springs<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah<s%>.
